params.sqlcmd: "select " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" as \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_NAME\\" as \\"ITEM_NAME\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"DRAW_CD\\" as \\"DRAW_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"SPEC\\" as \\"SPEC\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\" as \\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\" as \\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\" " +"from " +" M_ITEM " +"where " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" M_VEND_CTRL.\\"VEND_CD\\" as \\"VEND_CD\\", " +" M_VEND_CTRL.\\"VEND_ANAME\\" as \\"VEND_ANAME\\", " +" M_VEND_CTRL.\\"CUR_CD\\" as \\"CUR_CD\\", " +" M_VEND_CTRL.\\"ROUND_TYP\\" as \\"ROUND_TYP\\", " +" M_CUR.\\"CUR_NAME\\" as \\"CUR_NAME\\", " +" M_CUR.\\"DECIMAL_FIG\\" as \\"DECIMAL_FIG\\" " +"from " +" M_VEND_CTRL, " +" M_CUR " +"where " +" M_VEND_CTRL.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_VEND_CTRL.\\"VEND_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_VEND_CTRL.\\"CUR_CD\\" = M_CUR.\\"CUR_CD\\"(+)"

"select " +" M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"UNIT_COST\\" as \\"UNIT_COST\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"EFF_PHASE_IN_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD') as \\"EFF_PHASE_IN_DATE\\", " +" M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"UNIT_COST_TYP\\" as \\"UNIT_COST_TYP\\", " +" M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"ONEROUS_FLG\\" as \\"ONEROUS_FLG\\", " +" M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" " +"from " +" M_CONS_UNIT_COST " +"where " +" M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"VEND_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +"order by " +" M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"EFF_PHASE_IN_DATE\\""

"update " +" M_CONS_UNIT_COST " +"set " +" \\"UNIT_COST\\" = ?, " +" \\"UNIT_COST_TYP\\" = ?, " +" \\"ONEROUS_FLG\\" = ? " +"where " +" M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"VEND_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"EFF_PHASE_IN_DATE\\" = ?"

"select " +" M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" " +"from " +" M_CONS_UNIT_COST " +"where " +" M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"VEND_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"EFF_PHASE_IN_DATE\\" = ? " +"for update nowait"

"select " +" M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" " +"from " +" M_CONS_UNIT_COST " +"where " +" M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"VEND_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"EFF_PHASE_IN_DATE\\" = ?"

"delete from " +" M_CONS_UNIT_COST " +"where " +" M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"VEND_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"EFF_PHASE_IN_DATE\\" = ?"

"delete from " +" M_CONS_UNIT_COST " +"where " +" M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"VEND_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" COUNT(M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"COMPANY_CD\\") as \\"REC_COUNT\\" " +"from " +" M_CONS_UNIT_COST " +"where " +" M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"VEND_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" " +"from " +" M_CONS_UNIT_COST " +"where " +" M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"VEND_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +"for update nowait"

"SELECT " +" TO_CHAR(M_CONS_UNIT_COST.EFF_PHASE_IN_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') AS EFF_PHASE_IN_DATE, " +" M_CONS_UNIT_COST.UNIT_COST_TYP AS UNIT_COST_TYP, " +" M_CONS_UNIT_COST.UNIT_COST AS UNIT_COST, " +" M_CONS_UNIT_COST.ONEROUS_FLG AS ONEROUS_FLG " +"FROM " +" M_CONS_UNIT_COST " +"WHERE " +" M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" = ? " +" AND M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"VEND_CD\\" = ? " +" AND M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" AND M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" AND M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"EFF_PHASE_IN_DATE\\" = ?"

cell.name: p_UNIT_COST_NAME
cell.description: 単価区分 表示文字列

cell.name: p_ONEROUS_NAME
cell.description: 有償フラグ 表示文字列

cell.name: w_MRP_ODR_NAME
cell.description: 品目手配区分 表示文字列

cell.name: w_OUTSIDE_NAME
cell.description: 品目内外作区分 表示文字列
